ygData.subject: Re: Collapsible fishing pole & Spyglass
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps someone out there could at least give a hint as where to go?  The Gnome Citadel in Sol?  Back in Ak anon?  The BB Docks?  Somewhere else? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps someone out there could at least give a hint
as where to go? The Gnome Citadel in Sol? Back in
Ak'anon? The BB Docks? Somewhere else?


--- Jake Denley <jaked@...> wrote:
> From: Jake Denley <jaked@...>
>
> I was asked by someone to make me a fishing pole
> yesterday. He said he knew
> two people who could but they were on another
> continent. I said I would if he
> told me the recipe =) But he said they would not
> reveal it. People know and
> they are not sharing!@
